title: FS: SGC Graded T206 HOFers - LAST REDUCTION - UNDER VCP!
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: SGC Graded T206 HOFers - LAST REDUCTION - UNDER VCP!
posts.post_content:
Mostly HOF, a few southern leaguers and Hal Chase.  All prices include delivery; standard paypal is preferred.  Images are available at the link below; clicking the "down arrow" on the individual scans will allow you to download a supersized image:
[url]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers#100239[/url]

AVAILABLE
Mordecai Brown (Portrait) - P150 SGC20 - $80
Hal Chase (Portrait, Pink Background) - P350 SGC20 - $60
Hal Chase (Throwing, Dark Cap) - P350 SGC40 - $90
Johnny Evers (With Bat, Cubs On Shirt) - P150 SGC30 - $110
Rube Marquard (Hands At Thighs) - P150 SGC30 - $65
Iron Man McGinnity - P350 SGC40 - $90
John McGraw (Finger In Air) - P150 SGC30 - $65
Dolly Stark - P350 SGC40 - $85
Zack Wheat - P460-25 SGC50 - $200

SALE PENDING
John McGraw (Portrait, No Cap) - SC150-30 SGC50 - $175

CONSIGNED/TRADED
Ty Cobb (Portrait, Red Background) - SC350-30 SGC10 
Harry Bay - P350 SGC50 

SOLD
Frank Chance (Portrait, Yellow Background) - SC460-25 SGC50 - $210
Miller Huggins (Portrait) - P350 SGC40 
Clark Griffith (Portrait, serial 047) - P150 SGC30
Clark Griffith (Portrait, serial 011) - P150 SGC30 
Chief Bender (Pitching, No Trees In Background) - PB SGC50 
Nap Lajoie (With Bat) - OM SGC30 
Clark Griffith (Portrait) - P150 SGC60 
Rube Waddell (Throwing) - P150 SGC50

I'll take the Clark Griffith (Portrait, serial 011) - P150 SGC30 - $70

PM sent

I received the Griffith.  It is a gorgeous card!  If it weren't for the tiny bit of paper loss on the front I'm sure it would have been at least two grades higher.

Thanks for the great service!
last reduction... practically giving these away  :D
